mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sm_member_delivery ( member_seq, title, name, tel, cell, postcode, addr1, addr2, default_flag, reg_date ) VALUES ( #{memberSeq}, #{title}, #{name}, #{tel}, #{cell}, #{postcode}, #{addr1}, #{addr2}, #{defaultFlag}, NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE sm_member_delivery SET title=#{title}, name=#{name}, tel=#{tel}, cell=#{cell}, postcode=#{postcode}, addr1=#{addr1}, addr2=#{addr2}, default_flag=#{defaultFlag}, mod_date=NOW() WHERE seq=#{seq} AND member_seq=#{memberSeq}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM sm_member_delivery WHERE seq=#{seq} AND member_seq=#{memberSeq}
mapper.update: UPDATE sm_member_delivery SET default_flag='N' WHERE 1=1 AND member_seq=#{memberSeq} AND default_flag='Y'
mapper.select: SELECT A.seq, A.title, A.name, A.tel, A.cell, A.postcode, A.addr1, A.addr2, A.default_flag AS defaultFlag, A.reg_date AS regDate FROM sm_member_delivery A WHERE A.seq=#{seq} ORDER BY A.seq DESC
